what: Replace Outputs in a word document ‚Äî ReplaceOutputs
title: Replace Outputs in a word document ‚Äî ReplaceOutputs
text: R6 class allows , given template word document list outputs, add given location text. automates time-consuming task adding formatting tables figures word document. two main inputs class template docx file, case clinical trial report yaml file contain names table/figures replaced pointing new ones. yml file, predefined structure parameters set: type. Indicates table (TBL) figure (FIG) title. title caption table/figure template docx file file. name file (csv image) used new version docx widths. tables , pre-defined column widths (useful model parameter table, example) occurrence. Int. used captions duplicated one figure/table. set order appear word document. example yaml structure:
code: output_1:   type: TBL   title: "Caption of the output 1"   file: output_1.csv   widths: ~   occurrence: ~ output_2:   type: FIG   title: "Caption of the output 2"   file: output_2.png
